category: National Sports Festival Regulations/Article 39 (Installation of Advertisements, etc.)
contents: Article 39 (Installation of advertisements, etc.) ① The Sports Council has the authority to decide on the installation and display of advertisements in all stadiums used for general sports competitions. However, if the organizing committee or member sports organizations wish to attract advertisements, they must contact the Sports Council in advance. The details will be determined through consultation. Revised on February 11, 2020. ② Anyone who wishes to install or display advertisements on facilities within the stadium or on supplies necessary for the game must obtain prior approval from the Sports Council. Revised February 11, 2020. ③ Details regarding advertisement installation within the stadium shall follow separate regulations and agreements of the Sports Council.
